p: As of now, no effective therapy has been introduced for COVID-19. Some anti-inflammatory agents and cytokine release inhibitors, like corticosteroids and tocilizumab (acting against IL-6), have been proposed ( 17, 18). However, increasing risk of secondary infections, activation of latent tuberculosis, and other adverse effects are serious concerns ( 19). Lopinavir-ritonavir did not improve time to the clinical improvement and mortality ( 5). The efficacy of other therapeutic modalities, like convalescent plasma, is not clear ( 20).
